content: diagonally knit dishcloth one ball of worsted weight craft cotton i get 2 dishcloths out of 1 ball of sugar n cream cotton 95 yds /56 7g/2oz per ball size 7/4 5mm needles cast on 3 stitches knit 1 row knit 1 kfb of 1 stitch knit 1 knit 2 yo knit to the end of the row repeat the last row until there are 45 stitches on the needle or any number of stitches needed to get the desired size this is the half way point knit 1 knit 2tog yo knit 2tog knit to the end of the row repeat the last row until there are 5 stitches the middle stitch will be a yo knit 1 knit 2tog knit 2 knit 1 knit 2tog knit 1 bind off the 3 remaining stitches and weave in the ends kfb- knit into the front and back of a stitch yo- yarn over decrease- together pattern version by julie m hunt - 2013
